verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:22
verses.text: And Eleazar died, and had no sons, but daughters: and their brethren the sons of Kish took them.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:23
verses.text: The sons of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jeremoth, three.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:24
verses.text: These were the sons of Levi after the house of their fathers; even the chief of the fathers, as they were counted by number of names by their polls, that did the work for the service of the house of the Lord, from the age of twenty years and upward.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:25
verses.text: For David said, The Lord God of Israel hath given rest unto his people, that they may dwell in Jerusalem for ever:
